title: Short-run effects of an increase in AD

content.prompt: With an upward-sloping aggregate supply curve, an increase in aggregate demand in the short run will

choices.label: increase the unemployment rate and the inflation rate
decrease the unemployment rate and the inflation rate
increase real output and the price level
decrease real output and the price level
leave real output and the price level unchanged

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
